title: Smoked bacon, leek and roast garlic quiche
description: A real treat for summer lunches and picnics, this delicious quiche has parmesan in the pastry for a rich, savoury flavour.
ingredients: 250g/9oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
100g/3½oz unsalted butter, cubed, at room temperature, plus extra for greasing
4 leeks, washed, trimmed, quartered lengthways and finely sliced
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
